cat <<EOT > .github/workflows/terraform.yml
name: 'Terraform GCP Deploy'

on:
  push:
    branches: [ "main" ]
  pull_request:

jobs:
  terraform:
    name: 'Terraform'
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    # 1. Download the code from your repo
    - name: Checkout
      uses: actions/checkout@v4

    # 2. Log in to Google Cloud using your Secret
    - id: 'auth'
      name: 'Authenticate to Google Cloud'
      uses: 'google-github-actions/auth@v2'
      with:
        credentials_json: '\${{ secrets.GCP_SA_KEY }}'

    # 3. Install Terraform on the runner
    - name: Setup Terraform
      uses: hashicorp/setup-terraform@v3

    # 4. Initialize Terraform (Downloads providers)
    - name: Terraform Init
      run: terraform init

    # 5. Plan the changes (See what will happen)
    - name: Terraform Plan
      run: terraform plan -input=false

    # 6. Apply the changes (Only on merge to main)
    - name: Terraform Apply
      if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/main' && github.event_name == 'push'
      run: terraform apply -auto-approve -input=false
EOT
